51#ifndef AM_HAL_SECURITY_H
52#define AM_HAL_SECURITY_H

66//
67#define AM_HAL_SBL_ADDRESS 0x00000000
68
69typedef struct
70{
71 bool bInfo0Valid;
72 uint32_t info0Version;
73 uint32_t sblVersion;
74 uint32_t sblVersionAddInfo;
75} am_hal_security_info_t;
76
78typedef enum
79{
80 AM_HAL_SECURITY_LOCKTYPE_CUSTOMER = 0x1,
81 AM_HAL_SECURITY_LOCKTYPE_RECOVERY = 0x9D,
82} am_hal_security_locktype_t;
83
84typedef union
85{
86 uint32_t keyword[4];
87 struct
88 {
89 uint32_t key0;
90 uint32_t key1;
91 uint32_t key2;
92 uint32_t key3;
93 } keys;
94} am_hal_security_128bkey_t;
